text: [Vspomni,] kak 'Isa, syn Maryam, skazal: "O syny Israila! Voistinu, ya - poslannik Allakha k vam, podtverzhdayushchiy istinnost' togo, chto bylo v Tore do menya, i soobshchayushchiy vam blaguyu vest' o poslannike, kotoryy yavitsya posle menya i imya kotoromu - Akhmad". A kogda yavilsya on k nim s yasnymi znameniyami, oni zayavili: "Eto - yavnoye charodeystvo
